definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The flower girls carpeted the floor with rose petals before the bride's entrance.
sentences.chinese: 新娘進來前，花童以玫瑰花瓣撒滿了地板。

sentences.english: Our main products are evening dress, evening gowns and top grade fashion.
sentences.chinese: 主要的產品系有高級晚裝，花童禮服，高檔時裝。

sentences.english: Main produces the strain to have the high-quality evening clothes, colored virgin formal clothes, upscale fashionable clothing.
sentences.chinese: 主要的產品系有高級晚裝，花童禮服，高檔時裝。

sentences.english: Thee groom's niece has already asked to be the flower girl.
sentences.chinese: 她們已經請新郎的侄女當花童了。

sentences.english: Soft pastel natural colors are the true reflection of the beauty of these petite flower girls.
sentences.chinese: 蠟筆自然的顏色是這些嬌小花童的真實寫照。

sentences.english: The flower girls carpeted the floor with rose petals ago the bride's entrance.
sentences.chinese: 新娘進來前，花童將玫瑰花瓣撒滿了地板。

definition: child whose birthday is being celebrated/birthday boy/birthday girl
